#### Installation
```bash
$ [sudo] pip install kill-child-processes
```

#### Scripts usage
command|`usage`
-|-
`kill-child-processes` |`usage: kill-child-processes [-signal] pid`

#### Examples
```bash
kill-child-processes $$
```

signal:
```
kill-child-processes -PIPE $$
```
